form.title: Submission
form.description:
Please make sure to fill out all sections of the application. While you should provide clear details of your project timelines and scope, an application with lengthy responses is not necessarily preferable! We read through many submissions, so if you can concisely convey your ideas, we would greatly appreciate it. All applications will be received and reviewed on a rolling basis. Only one application per individual and/or team can be submitted at a time.

After completing your projectâ€™s pre-specified milestones, an individual or team can re-apply for another grant. Grants are issued in NEAR tokens but payment methods such as USD/ EUR can be issued in exceptional circumstances.

projectName.label: Project Name
projectName.error: Please enter a project name that is at least 1 characters long.

grantType.label: Are you applying for a grant (non-equity) or venture funding (equity)?
grantType.placeholder: Are you applying for a grant (non-equity) or venture funding (equity)?

projectDescription.label: Project Description
projectDescription.error: Please enter a project description that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

fundingAmount.label: How much funding are you requesting?
fundingAmount.error: Please enter a funding amount that is at least 1 USD.
fundingAmount.description: Please specify the exact amount you are requesting in USD. E.g. $50,000 * Grants will be given in USD value of NEAR tokens. (Benchmark: average grant <$50K USD)

budget.label: Estimated Budget
budget.error: Please enter a budget that is at least 1 USD.

milestoneDescription.label: Milestone Description
milestoneDescription.error: Please enter a description that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

whatAndWhy.label: What are you building & why?
whatAndWhy.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 100.

competitionDifference.label: What makes you different from your competitors?
competitionDifference.placeholder: What makes you different from your competitors?
competitionDifference.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 100.

openSourceState.label: Is your project open-source?
openSourceState.error: Please select an open source status.

opensourceComponentUse.label: Which components of the project will be open source?
opensourceComponentUse.placeholder: Which components of the project will be open source?
opensourceComponentUse.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 100.
opensourceComponentUse.description: Please provide as much detail as possible.

impactOnEcosystem.label: How will this impact the NEAR Ecosystem?
impactOnEcosystem.placeholder: How will this impact the NEAR Ecosystem?
impactOnEcosystem.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 1000.

excitementNear.label: What makes you excited about NEAR?
excitementNear.placeholder: What makes you excited about NEAR?
excitementNear.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 1000.

successMesurement.label: How will you measure project success?
successMesurement.placeholder: How will you measure project success?
successMesurement.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long.
successMesurement.description: What will success look like for your project? An example can be number of sign ups, active users, total TVL, NEAR ecosystem impact etc.

projectRaisingRound.label: Are you currently raising a round?
projectRaisingRound.placeholder: Are you currently raising a round?

firstname.label: First Name
firstname.error: Please enter a first name that is at least 1 characters long.

lastname.label: Last Name
lastname.error: Please enter a last name that is at least 1 characters long.

github.label: GitHub Profile URL
github.error: Please enter a valid GitHub profile URL.

twitter.label: Twitter Profile URL
twitter.error: Please enter a valid Twitter profile URL.

workingAloneOrTeam.label: Are you working alone or in a team?
workingAloneOrTeam.placeholder: Are you working alone or in a team?

hasPreviouslyReceivedFundingTokensGrants.label: Previously received funding, tokens, or grants from NEAR.
hasPreviouslyReceivedFundingTokensGrants.placeholder: Previously received funding, tokens, or grants from NEAR.

howHeardGrants.label: How did you hear about the NEAR Grants Program?
howHeardGrants.placeholder: How did you hear about the NEAR Grants Program?
howHeardGrants.error: Please select a how did you hear about NEAR Grants.
howHeardGrants.description: Please tell us how you found this program! Did you hack with us, see us in a newsletter, or something else?

referral.label: Did someone refer you to the NF Grants Program?
referral.placeholder: Did someone refer you to the NF Grants Program?

teamReferral.label: Do any of your team members self-identify as the following?
teamReferral.placeholder: Do any of your team members self-identify as the following?

comments.label: Comments
comments.error: Please enter a comment that is at least 1 character long and less than 1000.

blockchain.title: Submission to the DAO
blockchain.description: In order to continue the Grant Application request, you need to publish your grant application to the NEAR blockchain. In case you need assistance, please contact our team.

tx_error.title: The transaction failed
tx_error.description: The transaction failed. Please try again.

generic.title: The submission failed
generic.description: Please review the form errors below, and try again

form.message: Your form contains invalid values, please review and submit again
